title: how do you flirt with men
body:
im talking dudes over 35
like I saw this older man today he had such a fat butt and I really just wanted to talk to him somehow. but most of my flirtatious methods are immature and only work on young and naïve dudes

so to guys and girls with experience or older mature dudes how do i go about this. i swear i will never let a man with such a fat butt get away from me again without a fair fight
